stimulusHtml: Assume that  sort  is called with the array  {6, 3, 2, 5, 4, 1}.  Which of the following represents the contents of  data  after three passes of the outer loop (i.e., when  j == 2  at the point indicated by  /* End of outer loop */)?

features.html:
Consider the following method. This method correctly sorts the elements of array  data  into increasing order.

 

public static void sort(int[] data)
{
   for (int j = 0; j < data.length - 1; j++)
   {
      int m = j;
      for (int k = j + 1; k < data.length; k++)
      {
         if (data[k] < data[m])    /* Compare values */
         {
            m = k;
         }
      }
      int temp = data[m];    /* Assign to temp */
      data[m] = data[j];
      data[j] = temp;
      /* End of outer loop */
   }
}
